title: opera: file-editor lose focus if tab pressed + arrow-keys dont work
body:
### expected behaviour
file-editor uses tabs in the file
arrowkeys can be used to navigate through the file

### actual behaviour
pressing the tab-key: file-editor lose focus and the searchbar is focused.
pressing a arrow-key: nothing happens

### steps to reproduce
1. go to files
2. create text-file
3. click on the text-file, so that the editor opens
4. press the tab-key / any arrow-key

### server configuration
operating system: linux (df.de)

owncloud version: 5.0

### client configuration
browser: opera/9.80 (x11; linux x86_64; edition linux mint) presto/2.12.388 version/12.10

operating system: linux mint 13 (mate 64bit)

### logs
#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
{"app":"php","message":"function set_magic_quotes_runtime() is deprecated at \/kunden\/path\/webseiten\/owncloud\/lib\/base.php#402","level":4,"time":1363247300}
{"app":"php","message":"function set_magic_quotes_runtime() is deprecated at \/kunden\/path\/webseiten\/owncloud\/lib\/base.php#402","level":4,"time":1363247300}
{"app":"php","message":"session_start() [<a href='function.session-start'>function.session-start<\/a>]: ps_files_cleanup_dir: opendir(\/tmp) failed: permission denied (13) at \/kunden\/path\/webseiten\/owncloud\/lib\/base.php#328","level":2,"time":1363247300}
{"app":"php","message":"function set_magic_quotes_runtime() is deprecated at \/kunden\/path\/webseiten\/owncloud\/lib\/base.php#402","level":4,"time":1363247300}

### info
i searched the web and found this issue, maybe close related?
https://github.com/ajaxorg/ace/issues/13
